html:
5.23.22  3:08 pm   what should i do at a sleepover

      BE AWAKE!

5.23.22  2:58 pm   do you wish/plan to do hyperrealistic 3d videos at some point? 

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

5.23.22  1:31 pm   Is your next song going to be angry, loud and crazy?

      not exactly

5.23.22  12:55 pm   what is the BPM of your next song?

      97

5.23.22  12:22 pm   how would you describe the mood of your upcoming song?

      pretty good

5.23.22  12:10 pm   Do you know a person named Gertrude?

      no

5.23.22  11:43 am   WHY DO YOU NOT USE CAPS

      i do, but i realize it can appear that way if you have very selective vision

5.23.22  9:41 am   Do you have the musical skills to depict insanity in a song without using lyrics?

      absolutely

5.23.22  7:48 am   What is meant by "do not attempt" in "i'm a princess" at "bucket" by the bottom-right corner?

      let's see if this caption brightens the scene and helps the flow

5.23.22  7:44 am   Can you please remove the monsters from under my bed and in my closet

      i could re-locate them. but there will still be the same amount in total, according to the law of conservation of monsters

5.23.22  6:37 am   thoughts on violin

      smaller than viola, as i found out recently and did not expect

5.23.22  4:02 am   Monday 11.24.14 has music that feels like sitting in a living room and bantering back and forth while sunset light comes through the windows. Is there a longer version?

      yes, there's a version that's about 3 seconds longer which contains 1 more note and the cymbal ringing out after the rest of the instruments stop

5.23.22  3:10 am   how do I become more creative

      first, disassemble the entire observable universe into its component particles, then re-assemble it to taste

5.23.22  1:45 am   When I write a story, why do I want to subject a character I love deeply to so much trauma and pain?

      it could be a learning experience

5.23.22  12:38 am   If you write a song about a thing, do you ever wonder if the thing writes a song about you?

      yes

5.22.22  9:57 pm   What are the things you want to say and do?

      everything, if possible

5.22.22  7:52 pm   Why don't you make an angry, loud, crazy song?

      it's on my to-do list

5.22.22  6:59 pm   ever just love the whole entire universe?

      yes

5.22.22  5:26 pm   What exactly were you working on in the 6-month period between "got some money" and "more than a dream"?

      "more than a dream", and also making some improvements to the music production process

5.22.22  2:38 pm   Do all the harmonic extensions implied throughout your songs just materialize while improvising, or are you thinking "this needs to be a big V7b9#9 sound" and writing lines and aux keys figures to suit that?

It just feels like there's a logic to your idiosyncratic bananas harmonic sensibilities over the course of a song, and I'm curious how premeditated  it all is in your composition/recording process. 

      it's composed the same way as the words in your sentences. you intuitively know which words to use

5.22.22  10:21 am   Do you ever just study quantum mechanics?

      yes and no

5.21.22  10:34 pm   what is one of the words in the title of an upcoming song of yours?

      to

5.21.22  9:55 pm   was the meaning of "long long long journey" a metaphor for your own life or life in general?

      any life, or story

5.21.22  9:49 pm   how to fight something you don't know details of, but you know it's there. the catch is, every time you try to access info about it, you get hurt.

      first, see if you can locate the ground

5.21.22  5:07 pm   how to come up with song names for instrumental songs??

      ask yourself "which one is it"

5.21.22  3:46 pm   How can i make a song groovy?

      it's all about the follow through

5.21.22  2:47 pm   what is the 1st word of your next song?

      yes

5.21.22  12:14 pm   What is truth?

      could be you

5.21.22  11:21 am   is the world ready to begin yet?

      just about

5.21.22  9:51 am   do you actually answer these

      i don't recall

5.21.22  3:51 am   will any of the words in this question appear in your next song?

      yes

5.21.22  2:13 am   a lot of your songs are songs about writing songs, but have you ever written a song about writing a song about writing a song?

      i'm sure i have

5.21.22  1:49 am   Any tips for learning video editing?

      take out the bad parts

5.20.22  11:55 pm   How big of a span do you have with your right and left hands on the keyboard you wrote/record with?

I've been stretching for years but still barely have 10ths

     that doesn't seem particularly important

     I'm gonna guess you at comfortable black to white tenths and and fully stretched non-functional 12ths 

      absolutely not. i could play C and E for a picture, but not comfortably enough to be useful. the furthest stretch i'd ever do in real life would be a 9th, and only on same color keys

5.20.22  7:13 pm   why has the world gone insane?

     just trying to get by

      has it always been this insane

     yes

5.20.22  6:44 pm   what's your favorite clef to read/use?

      treble

5.20.22  3:18 pm   is there a chance that you'll continue adding stuff to the reality section?

      oh hell yeah

5.20.22  12:14 pm   how did you come up with "in the afternoon , at half 2. 1 past hows the day been and did it change yet" in "the world doesn't end"

      common sense, really

5.20.22  7:13 am   is the half of 8 3 or 4

      that depends whether it's a number or a numeral

5.20.22  2:00 am   Are there any items of clothing that strike you as particularly reusable?

      diaper

5.20.22  1:06 am   how to distinguish chords?

      work and play with them, on a continuing basis

5.19.22  11:10 pm   should we have flying cars yet?

      you should

5.19.22  9:48 pm   What do i look like in your mind?

      purple text

5.19.22  9:13 pm   In the notebook section, in 5/10/20, you said that "I"M SO SCARED". Was that the inspiration for the "i'm scared" song? 

      no

5.19.22  8:26 pm   binge watched all of your videos, now what?

      make some of your own

5.19.22  7:12 pm   how do you figure out what you are supposed to be doing. if there are many things that interest you. how do you pick the right thing to do

      that's easy, just do everything

5.19.22  6:53 pm   will the reality page ever get updated with new things?

     oh hell yeah

     i know you're probably focused on more important projects but i heavily enjoy seeing the thought process behind the videos and music

5.19.22  5:49 pm   How long is your next song?

      about 2:27

5.19.22  5:03 pm   i think I have strayed too far away from google

      it's impossible to stray away from google

5.19.22  4:50 pm   Do you have any lyrics that were part of Fly Around but got scrapped?

     let me check

     May I see some?

      somewhere there's a second screen displaying things exactly as they .. ?
     
     
     
     travel the
      walk over the
      go into the
      walk to the
     
     
     
      travel the world the world without my sandwich
     
     
     ...... much too high for this conversation
     
     
     
     
     so i hold on to all the details
      capture in on paper
      in series of words and phrases
     
     
     
     some people notice,
     
     
     
     i travel the world with special standards
     
     
     i walk into the room with no advantage
     
     
     i walk into the room and take my chances
     i walk back out
     
     
     
     climbing a tree with special branches,
     then i climb back down. now i can fly around
     
     
     walk into the room, it's still expanding      
     then i walk back out. now i can fly around
